sourcesContent:
<script>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import gql from 'graphql-tag';
import WeatherCard from './components/WeatherCard.vue';
import HourlyForecast from './components/HourlyForecast.vue';
import HistoricalWeatherTable from './components/HistoricalWeatherTable.vue';

export default {
  components: {
    WeatherCard,
    HourlyForecast,
    HistoricalWeatherTable,
  },
  setup() {
    const city = ref('');
    const weather = ref(null);
    const hourlyForecast = ref([]);

    const getWeather = async () => {
      try {
        const response = await this.$apollo.query({
          query: gql`
            query($city: String!) {
              getWeather(city: $city) {
                description
                temperature
                feels_like
                sunset
                icon
                hourly {
                  dt
                  temp
                  icon
                }
              }
            }
          `,
          variables: { city: city.value },
        });
        weather.value = response.data.getWeather;
        hourlyForecast.value = response.data.getWeather.hourly;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
      }
    };

    return {
      city,
      weather,
      hourlyForecast,
      getWeather,
    };
  },
};
</script>
